document_data.name: Ler
document_data.mainbody:
'''Ler''' was a commoner from the City of Coin, [[Athkatla]], in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{quote|''Aye, the [[wizard]] was angrier 'an a [[dragon]], blastin' these men in black. Bleedin' wizard killed 'em all an' took half the promenade too, 'fore he stopped.''|Ler}}
document_data.Description: Ler was a helpful man of average built with brown hair and fair skin.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1369}}, Ler was one of the eyewitnesses of a fierce magic battle between [[Jon Irenicus]], the [[Shadow Thieves]], and the [[Cowled Wizards]] that collapsed a part of the [[Waukeen's Promenade]] in Athkatla's [[Athkatla/Center District|Center District]]. He later recalled that a young spell-caster named [[Imoen]] was taken into custody by the Cowled Wizards along with the cruel [[archmage]].
